entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow with ice pellets in the evening and with rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
